name: Oh no! You got lost in the forest!
name_original: Oh no! You got lost in the forest!
description:
An submission for Oh No! Bitsy Jam. In this game you got lost in the forest and should get outa there. The game was made during 2 hours lol. Happy playing!

"Oh no! You got lost in the forest! - is the great thrilling adventure with unpredictible ending and tons of *awesome* humor!"  - CBCWF Gaming 2018.

"YOU SHOULD PLAY DAT GMAE WHATEVER IT COSTS FOR U" - ilostmypants.com

"The most popular game of all ages (in other universe maybe)" - realcoolgames-wtf-omg.com
